testcases.description: Test unrelated ERROR event is forwarded to general trace index
input: ERROR   13/Jul/2020:09:41:03.205 [0ffc:000000000000000000000000] failed to flush dirty page to ops DB: No such file or directory. open 'conf/opsdb.d/000001b7.idx' failed: cannot open index file 439: cannot flush page {"file":439,"page":5}

expected.message: failed to flush dirty page to ops DB: No such file or directory. open 'conf/opsdb.d/000001b7.idx' failed: cannot open index file 439: cannot flush page {"file":439,"page":5}

testcases.description: Test general info message is forwarded into general trace index
input: INFO    13/Jul/2020:15:11:52.189 [04b2:000000000000000000000000] Management Service - Pipe client disconnected

testcases.description: Trace line causing Logstash to fail and stop responding
input: DEBUG   03/Mar/2021:14:22:51.073 [19607:988d3f603f0063aef0c65174]     Event Log config [enabled=true, configFile= NotDefined, outputDir=/opt/axway/apigateway/events, header={"type":"header", "logCreationTime":"2021-03-03 14:22:51.073", "hostname":"api-gateway", "domainId":"fb69e91d-123b-49bc-a964-d76b8a30a810", "groupId":"group-2", "groupName":"EXP_GROUP_INT", "serviceId":"instance-1", "serviceName":"EXP_API_GW_INT_1", "version":"v7.7.0-Internal"}, writeSystemEventFreqSecs=60, customMessageAttributes=[], customSelectorAttributes=[${http.headers["X-CorrelationID"]}, ${http.headers["User-Agent"]}]]

expected.message: Event Log config [enabled=true, configFile= NotDefined, outputDir=/opt/axway/apigateway/events, header={"type":"header", "logCreationTime":"2021-03-03 14:22:51.073", "hostname":"api-gateway", "domainId":"fb69e91d-123b-49bc-a964-d76b8a30a810", "groupId":"group-2", "groupName":"EXP_GROUP_INT", "serviceId":"instance-1", "serviceName":"EXP_API_GW_INT_1", "version":"v7.7.0-Internal"}, writeSystemEventFreqSecs=60, customMessageAttributes=[], customSelectorAttributes=[${http.headers["X-CorrelationID"]}, ${http.headers["User-Agent"]}]]
